name: Config Override Alt Development
postCreateCommand: echo 'CONFIG_SOURCE: alternative-config' && echo 'CONFIG_TYPE: path' && echo 'CONTAINER_NAME: config-override-alternative' && echo 'TEST_MODE: devcontainer-alternative' && echo 'ALTERNATIVE_CONFIG: true' && echo 'This is the ALTERNATIVE configuration!' && echo 'CONFIG_OVERRIDE_TEST: PASSED - Alternative config loaded' && echo 'Container initialized successfully with ALTERNATIVE config'
